org.openscience.cdk.io.cml

Interface ICMLConvention

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICMLModule

    public interface ICMLConvention
extends ICMLModule
    This interface describes the procedures classes must implement to be plugable into the CMLHandler. Most procedures reflect those in SAX2.
    Author:
    Egon Willighagen <egonw@sci.kun.nl>
    Source code:
    master
    Belongs to CDK module:
    io
